block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: 按下按钮时 LED 亮起 ON LED when push button pressed

custom-block.comment: OFF 红色 LED OFF Red LED
OFF 黄色 LED OFF Yellow LED
OFF 绿色 LED OFF Green LED

scripts.comment: 点击绿色旗帜运行此程序 - 当“按钮按下”= 1时 - 说“按钮按下！” - 并将“按钮按下”重置为 0 click on Green flag to run this - traffic light will run in normal sequence - when "button pressed" = 1 - say "Pedestrain Crossing" - and reset "button pressed" to 0
点击绿色旗帜运行此程序 - 当“按钮按下”= 1时 - 说“按钮按下！” - 并将“按钮按下”重置为 0 click on Green flag to run this - when "button pressed" = 1 - say "Button PRESSED!" - and reset "button pressed" to 0
点击绿色旗帜来运行此程序 - 按下按钮时，变量“按下按钮”= 1 click on Green flag to run this - when button is press, variable "button pressed" = 1

custom-block.comment: 验证与 espSnap 的连接 verify connection to espSnap
